name: Solve Puzzle 1
requires: ((|Puzzle Piece 1| AND |Puzzle| AND {requiresNoOptions()})  OR ((|Puzzle Piece 1| AND |Puzzle|) AND ({requiresSolve()} AND {YamlDisabled(Roomsanity)})) OR ((|Puzzle Piece 1| AND |Puzzle|) AND ({YamlDisabled(more_unlocks)} AND {requiresCell()})) OR ((|Puzzle Piece 1| AND |Puzzle|) AND ({requiresSolve()} AND {requiresCell{}))

name: Decipher Hint 1
requires: ((|Hint 1| AND |Clue 1| AND |Clue 1-2| AND {requiresNoOptions()}) OR ({requiresCell()} AND {YamlDisabled(more_unlocks)}) OR ({YamlDisabled(Roomsanity)} AND {requiresDecipher()}) OR ({requiresCell()} AND {requiresDecipher()}))

name: Pickup Hint Fragment B
requires: (({requiresNoOptions()} AND |Hint Fragment A|) OR ({requiresHallwayLeadingToVaults()} AND {YamlDisabled(more_unlocks)} AND |Hint Fragment A|) OR ({requiresMoreUnlocksOnly()} AND |Hint Fragment A|) OR ({requiresHallwayLeadingToVaults()} AND {YamlEnabled(more_unlocks)} AND |Hint Fragment A|))

name: Pickup Hint Fragment C
requires: (({requiresNoOptions()} AND |Hint Fragment B|) OR ({requiresHallwayLeadingToVaults()} AND {YamlDisabled(more_unlocks)} AND |Hint Fragment B|) OR ({requiresMoreUnlocksOnly()} AND |Hint Fragment B|) OR ({requiresHallwayLeadingToVaults()} AND {YamlEnabled(more_unlocks)} AND |Hint Fragment B|))

name: Pickup Hint Fragment G

name: Pickup Hint Fragment H
requires: (({requiresNoOptions()} AND |Hint Fragment G|) OR ({requiresHallwayLeadingToStorageCloset()} AND {YamlDisabled(more_unlocks)} AND |Hint Fragment G|) OR ({requiresMoreUnlocksOnly()} AND |Hint Fragment G|) OR ({requiresHallwayLeadingToStorageCloset()} AND {YamlEnabled(more_unlocks)} AND |Hint Fragment G|))

requires: (({requiresNoOptions()} AND |Hint Fragment H|) OR ({requiresHallwayLeadingToStorageCloset()} AND {YamlDisabled(more_unlocks)} AND |Hint Fragment H|) OR ({requiresMoreUnlocksOnly()} AND |Hint Fragment H|) OR ({requiresHallwayLeadingToStorageCloset()} AND {YamlEnabled(more_unlocks)} AND |Hint Fragment H|))

name: Pickup Hint Fragment J
requires: (({requiresNoOptions()} AND |Hint Fragment I|) OR ({requiresHallwayLeadingToStorageCloset()} AND {YamlDisabled(more_unlocks)} AND |Hint Fragment I|) OR ({requiresMoreUnlocksOnly()} AND |Hint Fragment I|) OR ({requiresHallwayLeadingToStorageCloset()} AND {YamlEnabled(more_unlocks)} AND |Hint Fragment I|))

name: Pickup Hint Fragment K
requires: (({requiresNoOptions()} AND |Hint Fragment J|) OR ({requiresHallwayLeadingToStorageCloset()} AND {YamlDisabled(more_unlocks)} AND |Hint Fragment J|) OR ({requiresMoreUnlocksOnly()} AND |Hint Fragment J|) OR ({requiresHallwayLeadingToStorageCloset()} AND {YamlEnabled(more_unlocks)} AND |Hint Fragment J|))

name: Pickup Hint Fragment L

name: Pickup Hint Fragment M

name: Pickup Fragment Clue
requires: (({requiresNoOptions()} AND |Hint Fragment M|) OR ({requiresHallwayLeadingToStorageCloset()} AND {YamlDisabled(more_unlocks)} AND |Hint Fragment M|) OR ({requiresMoreUnlocksOnly()} AND |Hint Fragment M|) OR ({requiresHallwayLeadingToStorageCloset()} AND {YamlEnabled(more_unlocks)} AND |Hint Fragment M|))

name: Reassemble Hint 3
requires: (({requiresNoOptions()} AND {canReassembleHint()}) OR ({requiresCloset()} AND {YamlDisabled(more_unlocks)} AND {canReassembleHint()}) OR ({YamlDisabled(Roomsanity)} AND {requiresGlue()} AND {canReassembleHint()}) OR ({requiresCloset()} AND {requiresGlue()} AND {canReassembleHint()}))

name: Fill Bucket
requires: (({requiresNoOptions()} AND |Bucket|) OR ({requiresCloset()} AND {YamlDisabled(more_unlocks)} AND |Bucket|) OR ({YamlDisabled(Roomsanity)} AND {requiresFill()} AND |Bucket|) OR ({requiresCloset()} AND {requiresFill()} AND |Bucket|))

name: Pickup Magnifying Glass
requires: (({requiresNoOptions()} AND |Hint 3|) OR ({requiresCloset()} AND {YamlDisabled(more_unlocks)} AND |Hint 3|) OR ({requiresMoreUnlocksOnly()} AND |Hint 3|) OR ({requiresCloset()} AND {YamlEnabled(more_unlocks)} AND |Hint 3|))

name: Open Trapdoor
requires: (({requiresNoOptions()} AND {canOpenTrapdoor()}) OR ({requiresCloset()} AND {YamlDisabled(more_unlocks)} AND {canOpenTrapdoor()}) OR ({requiresMoreUnlocksOnly()} AND {canOpenTrapdoor()}) OR ({requiresCloset()} AND {YamlEnabled(more_unlocks)} AND {canOpenTrapdoor()}))

name: Pickup Puzzle Piece 3
requires: (({requiresNoOptions()} AND {canOpenTrapdoor()}) OR ({requiresCloset()} AND {YamlDisabled(more_unlocks)} AND {canOpenTrapdoor()}) OR ({requiresMoreUnlocksOnly()} AND {canOpenTrapdoor()}) OR ({requiresCloset()} AND {YamlEnabled(more_unlocks)} AND {canOpenTrapdoor()}))
